About me

Hello! You probably know my experience and skills a bit better now, but what about my personality? Let’s talk about some of my hobbies!


Music

I’ve been playing the piano since I was 8 years old. After years of musical practice, I decided to try the electric bass at 15 to join a band. Since then, I haven’t stopped playing in bands at the music school in my city. Some of my current favorite artists include Arctic Monkeys, Mac DeMarco and Adele.



Cinema

Outside of music, I also have a deep passion for cinema. I’m trying to catch up on many classics I might have missed, and I have to say they rarely disappoint. For instance, I really enjoy the New Hollywood era and the styles of directors like George Lucas, Francis Ford Coppola, or Steven Spielberg.



Video games

Finally, the last of my three main hobbies: video games. I don’t have as much time to play these days as I did when I was a kid, but I’m still excited to discover new games. I particularly enjoy solo adventure games with engaging stories. Some of my favourites from recent years include Firewatch, Limbo, and Outer Wilds.
